backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and data models for members, check-ins, tasks, notes, messages, announcements, and user profiles using in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose, routing roles, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root element via main.tsx.
frontend/src/announcements/AnnouncementC: Form page allowing coaches to compose and publish announcements with fields for title, content, target segment, and publication state.
frontend/src/announcements/Announcements: Displays a feed of published announcements with titles, segments, and content, or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, authentication gating, role-based routing, and main application layout rendering.
frontend/src/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen with coach/member tabs using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Provides a modal for entering name, role, and optional member ID before saving the user profile.
frontend/src/automations/CoachDigestPage: Displays a coach dashboard summarizing overdue and due-today tasks with quick navigation to member details.
frontend/src/automations/ReminderQueuePa: Lists members needing daily check‑in reminders and provides WhatsApp reminder actions.
frontend/src/checkins/DailyCheckinPage.t: Form for members to submit daily check‑in metrics and notes, then redirect to their dashboard.
Form for members to submit weekly measurements and reflections before navigating back to their dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that manages navigation, role-specific menus, and logout handling based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/dashboards/CoachDashboardPa: Coach dashboard displaying member stats, task counts, and quick navigation actions using query data.
frontend/src/dashboards/MemberDashboardP: Member dashboard showing streaks, weight progress, check-in data, and shortcuts to check-in pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the authenticated identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the current user's profile and role flags based on the active actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for members, check-ins, tasks, and announcements, using the backend actor for data access.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for light/dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/members/MemberFormDialog.ts: Dialog component for creating or editing a member profile with form state and mutation calls.
frontend/src/members/MemberListPage.tsx: Displays searchable member list with cards and an add-member dialog trigger.
frontend/src/members/MemberProfilePage.t: Shows detailed member profile, stats, actions, and an edit dialog, with clipboard support for member ID.
frontend/src/messaging/templates.ts: Defines WhatsApp message templates and a helper to substitute variables.
frontend/src/messaging/WhatsAppActions.t: Provides WhatsApp message sending using templates and logs message attempts.
frontend/src/reports/csv.ts: Utility for converting data arrays to CSV files and triggering downloads.
frontend/src/reports/ReportsExportPage.t: UI for exporting members, check-ins, and message logs to CSV.
frontend/src/settings/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders settings UI for reminder times and follow-up frequency with save button.
frontend/src/tasks/TaskListPage.tsx: Displays follow-up task stats and lists tasks by status with completion actions.
frontend/src/tasks/TaskStatusPill.tsx: Shows a badge indicating task status using predefined variant-label mappings.
frontend/src/timeline/MemberTimeline.tsx: Builds a unified timeline of member activity from various data sources with filtering options.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy utility with modern API and fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/roles.ts: Utility helpers for checking user roles and generating role labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, extensions, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a mobile-first coaching app with WhatsApp messaging and scheduled automations.
